channel.title: How do i replace

item.title: How do i replace
item.description:
@1080 wrote:

ok im trying to make it so if i click on somthing it removes all of that item and replaces it with another item, and if they dont have that item for it to say you do not have that item, any one got any ideas??

for example

[code]else if (useItemID == 946 && OnItemID == 1511)
{
addItem(995,1122);

}[/code]

Read full topic
